alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Harris; Marion; Muscogee; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 8:27AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Marion, Muscogee, central Chattahoochee, western Talbot and southeastern Harris Counties through 900 AM EST ... At 827 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Cataula to Edgewood to Fort Mitchell, and moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Talbotton, Waverly Hall, Woodland, Geneva, Fort Moore, North Fort Moore, Bibb City, Upatoi, Ellerslie, Laurel Hills, Juniper, Vista Terrace, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Baughville, Rose Hill, Eelbeck/West Fort Moore, Benning Hills, and Avondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
